actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Arms Export Control Act to allow the President under certain circumstances to extend the period within which Congress must act to disapprove particular arms transfer proposals.

summary.text: Amends the Arms Export Control Act to permit the President to extend the time period during which Congress must act to disapprove arms transfer or sales proposals.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Arms Export Control Act to allow the President under certain circumstances to extend the period within which Congress must act to disapprove particular arms transfer proposals.
